mapper.insert: INSERT INTO conversations (user_a_id, user_b_id, last_active_time, last_message) VALUES (#{userAId}, #{userBId}, #{lastActiveTime}, #{lastMessage})
mapper.select: SELECT conversation_id, user_a_id, user_b_id, last_active_time, last_message FROM conversations WHERE user_a_id = #{userId} OR user_b_id = #{userId} ORDER BY last_active_time DESC
